food.name: Mee Goreng Mamak
food.description: Perfect package with yellow noodles, beef or chicken, shrimp, soy sauce, veggies and eggs.

food.name: Apam Balik
food.description: Pancake-style snack wedded with the compact package of an omelet.

food.name: Roti John
food.description: Sandwich made with grilled minced meat and egg in the middle of slim bread, and drowned in a confection of condiments.
